title: Final Fantasy XV v1138403 + All DLC + Workshop Items
description:
Release date: March 6, 2018
Genre: Action, RPG, Open world, First-person, Third-person, 3D, Japanese
Developer: Square Enix
Publisher: Square Enix
Platform: PC
Engine: Luminous Engine
User ratings on Steam: 85% of user reviews - positive (3380 reviews)
Publication Type: Repack
Crack: Included (CODEX / ALI213)

Again in the way - at the limit of quality! A lot of bonus content, support for the highest resolution and HDR 10: in the beautiful world of FINAL FANTASY XV everything is thought out to the smallest detail. This you have not seen before!
Events Final Fantasy XV occur in a world where reality is side by side with fantasy. Together with Crown Prince Noktis and his comrades, you have to go on a grand journey.
Friendship, love, despair - much awaits the heroes along the way. They will learn the fate of Noktis and fight with the formidable empire of Niflheim. Memorable heroes, bewitching graphics, open world and dynamic battles in real time - Final Fantasy XV will be a real gift to longtime fans of the series, and to beginners

Included bonuses and DLC : 

Half-Life Costume (Main Game Exclusive)
Protective gear made at the Black Mesa Research Facility.
Crowbar (Main Game Exclusive)
Metallic tool that could prove quite useful in a pinch.
HEV Suit (COMRADES Exclusive)
Full outfit for the entire body, exclusive to COMRADES. Protective suit made at the Black Mesa Research Facility.
Scientist Glasses (COMRADES Exclusive)
Decorative accessory for the face, exclusive to COMRADES. Thick-rimmed black glasses that exude an air of quiet intelligence.
Crowbar (COMRADES Exclusive)
Metallic tool that could prove quite useful in a pinch. Exclusive to COMRADES.

How to install : 

Mount the iso
Install the game
Play
